member.name: T:Serilog.ObservableLoggerConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Adds the WriteTo.Observers() extension method to .

member.name: M:Serilog.ObservableLoggerConfigurationExtensions.Observers(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.Action{System.IObservable{Serilog.Events.LogEvent}},Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,Serilog.Core.LoggingLevelSwitch)
member.param: An action that provides an observable to which observers can subscribe.
The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
A switch allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.
